apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji depicts a loving couple, both men, with one rendered in a no-skin-tone hue and the other in a medium-dark skin tone, embracing closely.  The central heart, a vibrant red and softly curved as is typical for Apple's emoji style, glows with affection.  This representation on Apple devices celebrates diverse relationships and expresses deep love, partnership, and mutual adoration.
